message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation rate affects me more.
Your turn, Alice. Let's be fair to each other. This offer considers the inflation we both face.
I understand the inflation affects us both, Bob, but it's hitting me harder. I'm proposing a slight adjustment to your offer to be more equitable.
Time is running out, Alice. This offer is a compromise, acknowledging your higher inflation impact.
This is my final offer, Bob.  We need to settle this before inflation eats away at the value too much more.
